stable.label: Stable
stable.description: Patient condition is stable with minimal intervention needed

guarded.label: Guarded
guarded.description: Patient requires close monitoring with potential for change

unstable.label: Unstable
unstable.description: Patient condition is unstable requiring immediate intervention

changesSynced: Changes are automatically synced to all viewers in real-time
updatesAutomatic: You will see updates automatically as they are made
